trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.
trans-unit.target: Hierin wordt beschreven hoe abstract inhoud is toegewezen aan een concrete indeling.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding>
trans-unit.target: Deze abstracte klasse vormt de basisklasse voor de volgende klassen:- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> waarvan de huidige <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> lid is.

trans-unit.source: Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
trans-unit.target: Elk van de klassen afgeleid van de <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>klasse komt overeen met een beschrijving taal WSDL (Web Services)-element (`<input>`, `<output>` of `<fault>`) tussen de `<operation>` -element, wat op zijn beurt is ingesloten door de `<binding>` element.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>klasse die overeenkomt met `<operation>` -element in het WSDL-document.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over WSDL de specificatie op http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> waarvan de huidige <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> lid is.
